ListCtrl.Name: meidaAnalysisLst
ListCtrl.DataJoin: %{this}[%{this[Total(座席号)]} as 总数]%{orderrate}%{media}[%{media[Total(座席号)]} as 总数]%{consulting}[%{consulting[Total(座席号)]} as 总数]%{ordertype0}%{ordertype1}[%{ordertype1[Total(座席号)]} as 未购总数]%{saleinfo}%{orders}

DbDetails.Data: seatsno as 坐席号,sum(case when callOrderType<4 then 1 else 0 end)/count(*) as 成单率
DbDetails.Where: h_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}' and (h_mt<28 or h_mt>33) and h_mt!=40
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by seatsno

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_history as s inner join shop_meiti as m on s.h_mt=m.m_id
DbDetails.MDX: 座席号,m_desc(中国之声|网络推广|北京新闻05:00-05:45|北京故事06:25-06:40|北京城管09:25-09:30|中国音乐之声|中国文艺之声|天津经济台|河北交通|河北经济|河北新闻|中国经济之声|环球咨讯|平面报纸广告|老用户订购|电视广告|媒体不详|其它|呼出|无人接听|售后找人|拜访来电|短信来电|重复进线),cnts
DbDetails.Data: s.seatsno as 座席号,m.m_desc, count(*) as cnts
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by seatsno,m_desc

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_history as s inner join shop_zx_concent as z on s.z_id =z.id
DbDetails.MDX: 座席号,z_desc(咨询活动|咨询眼病|售后问题|其它) ,cnts
DbDetails.Data: s.seatsno as 座席号,z.z_desc, count(*) as cnts
DbDetails.Where: h_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}' and (h_mt<28 or h_mt>33) and h_mt!=40
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by seatsno,z_desc

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_history as s inner join shop.call_ordertype as c on s.callOrderType =c.id
DbDetails.MDX: 座席号,info_type(老订|新订|他人续单),cnts
DbDetails.Data: s.seatsno as 座席号,c.info_type, count(*) as cnts
DbDetails.Where: h_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}' and (h_mt<28 or h_mt>33) and h_mt!=40
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by seatsno,info_type

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_history as s inner join shop.call_ordertype as c on s.callOrderType =c.id
DbDetails.MDX: 座席号,info_type(新未购|重复未购|售后未购),cnts
DbDetails.Data: s.seatsno as 座席号,c.info_type, count(*) as cnts
DbDetails.Where: h_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}' and (h_mt<28 or h_mt>33) and h_mt!=40
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by seatsno,info_type

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_order as s inner join shop_order_detail as d on s.o_id=d.o_id inner join shop_product as p on d.p_id=p.p_id
DbDetails.Data: o_jobno as 座席号,sum(case when p_name=14 and num between 4 and 7 then 1 else 0 end) as '4~7',sum(case when p_name=14 and num between 8 and 11 then 1 else 0 end) as '8~11',sum(case when p_name=14 and num between 12 and 15 then 1 else 0 end) as '12~15',sum(case when p_name=14 and num between 16 and 19 then 1 else 0 end) as '16~19',sum(case when p_name=14 and num>=20 then 1 else 0 end) as '20以上',sum(case when p_name=23 and num between 1 and 3 then 1 else 0 end) as '蓝莓1~3',sum(case when p_name=23 and num between 4 and 6 then 1 else 0 end) as '蓝莓4~6',sum(case when p_name=23 and num >=7 then 1 else 0 end) as '蓝莓7盒以上'
DbDetails.Where: o_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}' and o_state!=2 and o_state!=0
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from (select s.o_jobno,p.p_name,d.p_num as num from %{dbtable} where %{where}) as b group by o_jobno

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_order_detail as d inner join shop_order as o on d.o_id=o.o_id inner join shop_product as p on p.p_id=d.p_id
DbDetails.Data: o_jobno as 坐席号,count(distinct o.o_id) as 单数,sum(case when p.p_name=14 or p.p_name=23 then d.p_num else 0 end) as 盒数,sum(case when p.p_name=14 then d.p_num else 0 end) as 眼贴盒数,sum(case when p.p_name=23 then d.p_num else 0 end) as 蓝莓盒数
DbDetails.queryFormat: select * from (select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by o_jobno) as b

DbDetails.DbTable: (select * from shop_history where h_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}') as s inner join shop.in_calltype as c on s.newcustomer=c.id inner join shop.SeatsInfo on SeatsInfo.SeatsNo=s.seatsno
DbDetails.Data: s.seatsno as 座席号,c.typedesc, count(*) as cnts
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by s.seatsno,typedesc
